meanings.definition: A person who uses crayons to create art.
meanings.sent1: The young crayonists happily colored their drawings in bright hues.
meanings.sent2: The crayonists at the art class showcased their colorful masterpieces.
meanings.sent3: The crayonists decided to have a 'coloring contest' to see who could create the most vibrant artwork.
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, crayonists are the magicians who bring life to paper with their colorful wands.
meanings.sent5: The image created by the talented crayonists was so vivid, it seemed to jump off the page.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who specialize in using crayons for artistic purposes.
meanings.sent1: During the art exhibition, the crayonists gathered to discuss their techniques.
meanings.sent2: The talented crayonists collaborated on a mural that brightened up the entire room.
meanings.sent3: The crayonists jokingly referred to themselves as the 'Crayon Crew' and shared a laugh.
meanings.sent4: Among the artists, the crayonists stood out like a colorful bouquet in a field of green.
meanings.sent5: The community of crayonists was a vibrant and supportive group, always inspiring each other to create.
